Articles.Content:
My physicial time clock turns to yellow/red when camera shows terrain (both when im on surface or when i look at planet from orbit).

I know thats probably due to my potato intel graphic card, but is there any way around it?

Hello, fellow intel graphics card user ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

You could lower the in-game graphics settings if you haven't already.

Low terrain detail, terrain scatter off, faster render quality, low texture resolutions.

Be careful with changing the terrain detail though. It has been known to make ships load underground, although I think that got fixed.
